name: Introduction to Musicology
description: This course provides a broad overview of musicology as a field of study, and introduces students to basic concepts such as musical form, scale, and notation.

name: Advanced Music Theory
description: This course covers more advanced topics in music theory such as counterpoint, musical forms, and musical analysis.

name: History of Western Music
description: This course covers the history of western music from the Middle Ages to the present day, focusing on the major musical genres and their development.

name: Performance Theory
description: This course covers the theory and practice of musical performance, including topics such as interpretation, improvisation, and the understanding of musical performance in a larger social and cultural context.
